Name: Cable Guardian
About the game: Prevent cable twisting effortlessly! Cable Guardian keeps track of your rotation in VR and lets you know when to turn the other way. Forget the cable and focus on the fun! See the Pro DLC for position indicators and more. Unlimited free trial. Features Audio notifications with volume and pan adjustment Support for custom sounds (*.wav) Editable rules for triggering the sounds (rotation, orientation etc.) Timer / alarm clock Audio device selection Auto-start with Windows or SteamVR Extremely low CPU and GPU usage - no impact on gaming Native Oculus support Oculus headset users can use Cable Guardian without SteamVR. Just leave Cable Guardian running in the background and it works in every game regardless of the platform (Oculus Home or SteamVR). Note that this does not apply to the Pro -version visual features that require SteamVR . Get more features with Cable Guardian Pro DLC ... (Try for free)
